item.title: Trump announces Vietnam trade deal, 20% tariff on its imports to U.S.
item.description: President Donald Trump said the United States has struck a trade deal with Vietnam.

item.title: House Republicans race to pass Trump's megabill amid GOP divisions
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson can lose just three members' votes and still pass the bill in a party-line vote. But more than a dozen Republicans are currently ...

item.title: House Republicans don't have the votes yet to pass Trump's megabill
item.description: It's unclear how many House Republicans are firm "no" votes and how many are wavering. But Speaker Mike Johnson does not have a lot of wiggle room.

item.title: House Republicans subpoena Brown University and Penn in Ivy League antitrust probe
item.description: The probe was first launched in April, but the universities' responses were deemed "inadequate."

item.title: GOP Sen. Murkowski cast crucial vote for Trump's megabill after getting key carveout
item.description: Alaska Sen. Lisa Murkowski's vote for Trump's megabill gave Republicans the 50 votes they needed for Vice President JD Vance a cast the tiebreaker and...
